definitions.title: n.pr.loc.,
definitions.body: only in [[וְדָן וְיׇוׇן]] Ez Eze 27:19 Wedān and Yāwān (cf. VB and reff.) but identif. wholly dub.; = Waddân near Medina acc. to Glas:Skizze ii. 428: LXX om.; text prob. corrupt, cf. Sta:Javan. 11 ff. Da al.; Ew Hi rd. [[דְּדָן]], but [[דְּדָן]] is in following v., and anticipation improb., cf. Sta:l. c.; Co rds. (for [[ודן ויון]]) [[וְאַרְנׇבָן]], on the basis of Bab. & As. Aranabanim, Arnabani, n.pr.loc., following Ḫilbunim ([[חֶלְבּוֹן]]) in lists of places whence wine was brought (cf. [[יֵין חֶלְבּוֹן]] v:Eze 27:18, & LXX kai\ oi)=non for [[ויון]]; also COT Ez Eze 27:18).
